spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout resembles the plan (garage at bottom-right, large living/kitchen to left, bedroom wing to right), but multiple spatial mismatches are present. Living room window wall shows an incorrect count/spacing vs plan (extra/misaligned openings). Covered patio areas from the plan are not modeled as distinct exterior/covered spaces, affecting major adjacency cues. Several interior door locations/orientations do not match the plan (notably study entry style and some hall/bedroom openings). Room proportions are distorted: living area appears oversized relative to adjacent rooms, and the central hall/utility/bath cluster geometry does not preserve the plan’s clear corridor widths and offsets.

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall thickness is generally consistent, but key architectural elements from the plan are missing or simplified (both covered patios not represented as defined spaces; several openings appear shifted). Some adjacency relationships are weakened by altered partitions in the central hall/service core (bath/utility/bedroom #4 zone) and by the simplified nook/patio connection. No obvious fully hallucinated new rooms, but several partitions/doors/windows appear invented or relocated relative to the 2D plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Only partial kitchen cabinetry/peninsula is represented. Bathrooms lack fixtures (toilet/vanity/tub/shower), bedrooms lack closets/built-ins from the plan, and dining/study/living furnishings are not mapped. Scale of the shown kitchen elements is plausible, but the overall interior is largely unfurnished compared to the plan’s fixture intent.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is clean and readable with decent lighting and consistent materials. Camera is a perspective/isometric-like view but not truly orthographic/isometric. Geometry is mostly clean with minimal artifacts, though some openings and wall junctions look simplified and reduce plan legibility.

detected_errors.description: Top-left covered patio from the 2D plan is not modeled as a distinct covered exterior space in the 3D render.
Bottom (central) covered patio from the 2D plan is not modeled as a distinct covered exterior space in the 3D render.
Living room north/top exterior window set does not match the 2D plan (count/spacing appears different; render shows a longer row of windows than indicated).
Window placement on the nook/bay area appears inconsistent with the 2D plan’s nook geometry and opening locations.
Study entry is shown as a single door in the 3D render, while the 2D plan indicates a wider/double-door style opening.
Several plan-specified interior doors/openings (notably in the hall/service core around bath/utility/bedroom #4) are missing or not clearly represented as located in the plan.
Central hall/utility/bath partitioning is rearranged/simplified relative to the 2D plan, altering corridor offsets and room boundaries.
Room proportion distortion: living room volume appears oversized relative to dining/study and the bedroom wing compared to the 2D plan proportions.
Dining room exterior window location/visibility does not clearly match the 2D plan (appears missing or shifted).
Bathroom fixture layouts (master bath and hall bath) shown in the 2D plan are not modeled in 3D (tub/vanities/toilets/showers absent).
Closet/interior built-in indications (e.g., WIC detailing and secondary bedroom closet partitions) are simplified or missing compared to the 2D plan.
